article: When Sang Lan got to the Goodwill Games held in New York, she felt very happy. She was a devoted athlete, who had spent many years practising her sport. Her strongest  _  was the vault and she was the best in China. She hoped to win this event at the games. However, during a practice vault, this young girl made a small mistake. Her mistake  _  her the ability to walk. Instead of landing on her feet, Sang landed on her head and broke her neck. She was  _  to a top hospital, and doctors said she would never walk again. While in hospital, Sang had many  _  , including Christopher Reeve, an actor who once played Superman. Reeve could not  _  either, due to an unfortunate horse riding accident. He  _  Sang to stay positive and told her that being  _  wouldn't help her get better. Sang already knew this and  _  the sympathy and admiration of people across the world with her good  _  and beautiful smile. Sang  _  to China, and hosted a sports programme about the 2008 Beijing Olympics. Sang Lan works hard at everything she does. She is a role model for young people nationwide!
